title: S4 Ep211: Fat in Hollywood: Wednesday, December 8th, 2021
itunes:title: Fat in Hollywood: Wednesday, December 8th, 2021
description:
1. Adam Sandler is 2021's top style star, according to Google (Page Six Style)
2. Dorit Kemsley's husband, PK Kemsley, arrested for DUI (Page Six)
3. Rebel Wilson Got 'Pushback' from Her Team When She Started Losing Weight (PEOPLE)
4. Drake Withdraws His 2022 Grammy Nominations (Variety)
5. 'And Just Like That' filmed fake scenes to throw off fan spoilers (NY Post)
Vanderpump Rules Recap

The Morning Toast with Claudia (@girlwithnojob) and Jackie Oshry (@jackieoshry)
